root.name: The Document of Metal Gear Solid 2
root.description: OverviewThe Document of Metal Gear Solid 2 contains VR missions, documentation of in-game content and development of the game, and trailers. It provides the player with an in-depth look at the making of the game.There are 5 VR Missions in The Document of Metal Gear Solid 2 that are also featured in Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance. Since The Document of Metal Gear Solid 2 was released before Substance, it served as a preview as to what VR missions would be included in the game.
